sentiment.summary: The tweets express a mix of positive and negative sentiments. Some people are expressing happiness, gratitude and feeling blessed, while others are complaining about sore throats, colds, COVID-19 symptoms and feeling unwell. There are a few spikes in negativity related to people being sick with sore throats, coughs, fatigue and testing positive for COVID-19. However, there are also notable positive tweets expressing joy and appreciation for friendships and upcoming birthdays.
notable_examples: Positive: "You make friendship so BEAUTIFUL. You handle me with so much careeeee😅 I don't know how best to explain it but I am such a blessed and lucky girl."
Positive: "Red eyes, stuffy nose, shaky breath but a FULL HEART. I am happy🥹❤️ It's my birthday in some weeks.😅"
Negative: "Woke up feeling so under the weather, another day stuck in bed with a sore throat"
Negative: "In the ER with chest pain and shortness of breath . Not fun. Hate hospitals"
Negative: "Think I'm getting sick. Woke up with a sore throat and a headache Ugh"

sentiment.summary: The tweets express a largely negative sentiment, with many people complaining of sore throats, coughs, stuffy noses, and other cold/flu-like symptoms. There are several mentions of people testing positive for COVID-19 or suspecting they have a new COVID variant. A few tweets express skepticism about COVID deaths being accurately reported. Overall, the mood is one of feeling sick, frustrated, and fatigued.
notable_examples: Feeling so under the weather today, stuck inside with a sore throat and a never-ending supply of tea
omg I got a painful headache and sore throat + my monthly just came on 💔 like brooo
tested positive for covid after 5 years of never getting it
No one died from covid. They died from every other thing and then "tested positive" for covid. Quit hiding behind your bank account. We know the truth you won't admit.

sentiment.summary: The tweets express a largely negative sentiment, with many people complaining of sore throats, stuffy noses, coughs, and other cold/flu-like symptoms. There are mentions of a new COVID variant causing particularly bad sore throats. A few positive tweets exist about loving oneself and recovering from illness, but the overall mood is decidedly negative due to the prevalence of people feeling sick.
notable_examples: Crying on top of a stuffy nose just ain't it .
@AkilahObviously I had that with my initial Covid infection in 2021. It was the worst sore throat I've ever had.
IF I WAKE UP TOMORROW WITH A SORE THROAT IM CRASHING OUT

New COVID variant NB.1.8.1 detected in the US (NYC, CA, WA & more), linked to hospitalization spikes in China. Symptoms include fatigue, sore throat, nausea, blurred vision & more. Stay informed, stay safe, and get boosted! 😷
Feeling so under the weather today, stuck inside with a sore throat and a never-ending supply of tea

sentiment.summary: The tweets express significant concern and negativity around a new COVID-19 variant called NB.1.8.1. Many report experiencing painful sore throats, fatigue, and other cold-like symptoms. There are spikes in tweets about people testing positive recently and warnings for others to mask up again. A few express skepticism about the severity. Overall, the mood is quite negative and anxious about this new wave of infections.
notable_examples: Not even joking my mom has had a serious cough and sore throat for the last two days

🚨 New COVID variant NB.1.8.1 detected in the US (NYC, CA, WA & more), linked to hospitalization spikes in China. Symptoms include fatigue, sore throat, nausea, blurred vision & more. Stay informed, stay safe, and get boosted! 😷 #COVID19 #NB181 #HealthAlert
‼️ Hey friends. If you don't want a sore throat that feels like broken glass (current variant symptom from hell), it's time to 😷 if you stopped. Latest c0vid wave is making its way around the world…

I already had it and im Upstate! Your throat feels like a hundred razor blades cut it and you may run a fever and have a bad cough.  Mine turned into pneumonia after 7 days 🤷🏾‍♀️ Negative for covid but i havent had a sore throat in 25+ years!

sentiment.summary: The tweets express a predominantly negative sentiment, with many people complaining about being sick with symptoms like sore throat, stuffy nose, cough, fever, and fatigue. There are mentions of COVID-19, allergies, and other illnesses. A few tweets also express frustration or make jokes about their health issues. Overall, the mood is one of discomfort, annoyance, and feeling unwell.
notable_examples: GUYS I DESPERATELY NEED TO MAKE SOME MOMEYS TO PAY MY RENT WHICH IS DUE IN 2 DAYS LMAOOOO I haven't been able to post much bc I've been busy with family and dealing with their stupid drama🙄 and I've been sick wifh a sore throat & an EAR INFECTION & I just got my period today😔

Goodnight pretty ppl have the sweetest dreams of getting rid of a sore throat fast, uhhh, a strong pelvic floor idk, a trampoline park, funnel cake and churros but not in the same sitting, a free congo, sudan, and palestine, PEOPLE TAKING CLIMATE CHANGE SERIOUSLY and hot ppl🌙 💕

Last 13 days:

Depressive state to where i break down at work
Got sick
Insane sore throat
Panic attack
Better from the sick
Still dealing with throat issues but can talk again
Can't sleep longer than 2 hours at a time due to anxiety
Cat ran away 😢
